item.Q:
Write the character:
to gather; to unite; to unify; whole
item.A:
traditional: 統
tǒng
统一 (統一) tǒngyī to unify; to unite; to integrate

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: day of a month; (suffix used after) name of a ship; (ordinal) number
2: roar; cry
item.A:
traditional: 號
1: hào 2: háo
信号 (信號) xìnhào signal 国号 (國號) guóháo title of current dynasty (as the name of China), such as Tang or Ming; name of a country (such as People's Republic of China 中華人民共和國|中华人民共和国 or Republic of China 中華民國|中华民国)

item.Q:
Write the character:
knot; sturdy; to bear (fruit); bond; to tie; to bind; to check out (of a hotel)
item.A:
traditional: 結
jié
结果 (結果) jiéguǒ outcome; result; conclusion; to kill; to dispatch

item.Q:
Write the character:
to live; alive; living; work; workmanship
item.A:
huó
生活 shēnghuó life; activity; to live

item.Q:
Write the character:
the west; Spain (abbr.); Spanish
item.A:
Xī
东西 (東西) dōngxī east and west

item.Q:
Write the character:
business; occupation; study
item.A:
traditional: 業
yè
工业 (工業) gōngyè industry

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: to pass on; to spread; to transmit; to infect; to transfer; to circulate; to pass on; to conduct (electricity)
2: biography
item.A:
传 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 傳
1: chuán 2: zhuàn
传统 (傳統) chuántǒng tradition; convention 海上花列传 (海上花列傳) hǎishànghuālièzhuàn The Sing-Song Girls of Shanghai by Han Bangqing 韓邦慶|韩邦庆, long novel of lower life in classical Chinese and Jiangsu vernacular; translated into Putonghua as 海上花 by Iris Chang

item.Q:

item.A:
yuán

item.A:
traditional: 萬
wàn
十万 (十萬) shíwàn hundred thousand

item.A:

huáng
黄色 (黃色) huángsè yellow; pornographic
